name: Volunteer At The Farm
description: Join them any Saturday morning from 10 am to 1 pm to weed, plant, dig, and grow at the farm! Be sure to wear comfortable clothes and shoes. You can also support them with your volunteer services outside the farm. They need helping hands in all areas from general administration and marketing to light construction.
fullDescription: Join them any Saturday morning from 10 am to 1 pm to weed, plant, dig, and grow at the farm! Be sure to wear comfortable clothes and shoes. You can also support them with your volunteer services outside the farm. They need helping hands in all areas from general administration and marketing to light construction.
whatTheyOffer: Join them any Saturday morning from 10 am to 1 pm to weed, plant, dig, and grow at the farm! Be sure to wear comfortable clothes and shoes. You can also support them with your volunteer services outside the farm. They need helping hands in all areas from general administration and marketing to light construction.
howToGetIt: When you arrive, ask for farm manager Johnny Chen or farmer-in-charge Faheem Carter.
